permission.name: Instance Permission
permission.alertDesc: Log Hub use Systems Manager to configure and update Log Agent, S3 to store configurations and Kinesis to collect data. Please grant the following permissions to your EC2 Instance Profile. Learn more about

ingestSetting.indexNameDesc: Enter the index name of the log saved in Amazon OpenSearch.
ingestSetting.indexNameFormatError: Index name must start with a lowercase letter and can only support lowercase letter, number, - and _
ingestSetting.shardNumDesc: Specify the number of Shards of the Kinesis Data Streams. Each shard can have up to 1,000 records per second and total data write rate of 1MB per second.
ingestSetting.shardNumError: Shard Number must be greater than or equal to 1
ingestSetting.enableAutoSDesc: Enable auto scaling of the Kinesis Data Streams shards?
ingestSetting.maxShardNumError: Max Shard Number must be greater than Shard number

specifySource.selectFileType: Please select a log file type
